            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%8E%E6%98%A5%E8%8E%B9%E6%89%B9%E7%BE%8E%E6%94%BF%E5%AE%A2%E8%A8%80%E8%AE%BA%E6%97%A0%E8%80%BB%E6%97%A0%E5%BE%B7%23&amp;from=default">#华春莹批美政客言论无耻无德#</a>】4月2日，针对近日美国副总统彭斯、美国国务卿蓬佩奥指责中国刻意隐瞒和造假疫情的言论，外交部发言人华春莹表示，我们愿意本着人道主义的精神，去为美国抗击疫情提供力所能及的帮助和支持。但是这几个美国政客的言论所作所为实在是无耻、无德。此时此刻，作为政治家， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBvf9Aqve" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489382398681688:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489382398681688&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=3922377142&amp;cid=4489382616683347&amp;nick=今日甜分&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-2 21:54</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8F%A3%E8%BF%B0%E5%8F%B2%23&amp;from=default">#方舱口述史#</a> | 康复患者希望献血浆，因超过60岁未能成行】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%8537%E5%A4%A9%E5%90%8E%E5%9B%9E%E8%AE%BF%23&amp;from=default">#首批方舱出院患者37天后回访#</a>，60岁的徐女士讲述她的心路历程：一开始确诊后不让住院，很不理解，后来才知道，重症病人太多了。康复后，她主动联系医院献血浆，但因超过60岁未能成行，“以后还有什么做义工干嘛，如果需要我还是愿意去”。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBuXgyXbT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489371308330685:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489371308330685&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 投诉 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【他们是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%E8%83%8C%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#援鄂团队背后的英雄#</a>】武汉的春天终于按下播放键，浙江援鄂团队凯旋。为了能让医疗队员全力投入到抗疫工作中，背后有一群后勤保障队员、志愿者也在默默支持。如今他们也结束了47个在疫情前线的日日夜夜，顺利凯旋。辛苦了，致敬幕后英雄！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489342888683694:2017607-video:2017607%3A4489342882611225:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489342888683694:2803301701" title="万能编辑部的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZWmpoy" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZWmpoy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>万能编辑部的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">扩散！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E6%8F%90%E9%86%92%E6%9A%82%E5%8B%BF%E5%89%8D%E5%BE%80%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%AB%98%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A926%E5%9B%BD%23&amp;from=default">#外交部提醒暂勿前往疫情高风险26国#</a>】4月2日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E6%96%B0%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%8311%E4%B8%AA%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%AB%98%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#外交部新公布11个疫情高风险国家#</a>，郑重提醒中国公民暂勿前往意大利、美国、西班牙、德国、伊朗、法国、韩国、瑞士、英国、荷兰、奥地利、比利时、挪威、葡萄牙、瑞典、澳大利亚、巴西、土耳其、马来西亚、丹麦、加拿大、以色列、捷克、爱 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBu8Ztg0G" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489340136973058:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489340136973058&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%9714%E5%90%8D%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%A2%AB%E8%AF%84%E4%B8%BA%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%23&amp;from=default">#湖北14名防疫一线牺牲人员被评为首批烈士#</a>】湖北省人民政府评定王兵、冯效林、江学庆、刘智明、李文亮、张抗美、肖俊、吴涌、柳帆、夏思思、黄文军、梅仲明、彭银华、廖建军等14名牺牲在新冠肺炎疫情防控一线的人员为首批烈士。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%E7%AE%80%E8%A6%81%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#湖北疫情防控牺牲烈士简要情况#</a>↓↓送别英雄！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489334151297656:1022-article:1022%3A2309404489334152626269:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489334151297656:2803301701" title="湖北14名防疫一线牺牲人员被评为首批烈士" href="http://t.cn/A6ZWY5BA" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZWY5BA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>湖北14名防疫一线牺牲人员被评为首批烈士</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489324886125948" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBtKopHDC?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 18:05" date="1585821923000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489324886125948:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 18:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%9714%E5%90%8D%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E8%A2%AB%E8%AF%84%E4%B8%BA%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%23&amp;from=default">#湖北14名防疫一线牺牲人员被评为首批烈士#</a>】湖北省人民政府评定王兵、冯效林、江学庆、刘智明、李文亮、张抗美、肖俊、吴涌、柳帆、夏思思、黄文军、梅仲明、彭银华、廖建军等14名牺牲在新冠肺炎疫情防控一线的人员为首批烈士。他们奋不顾身、坚守一线，同时间赛跑，与病魔较量，日夜守护人民群众生 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBtKopHDC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489324886125948:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489324886125948&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489320930774042" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBtE13fmy?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 17:49" date="1585820980000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489320930774042:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 17:49</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E8102%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙新增8102例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8511%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计确诊超11万例#</a>】据西班牙卫生部2日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例8102例，新增死亡病例950例，累计确诊病例达110238例，其中10003人死亡，26743人治愈出院。（人民日报记者姜波） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%A6%82%E6%89%B0%E4%B9%B1%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E4%BC%9A%E8%A2%AB%E4%BE%9D%E6%B3%95%E8%BF%BD%E8%B4%A3%23&amp;from=default">#外交部回应外国人如扰乱防疫会被依法追责#</a>】据新华社，针对一些在华外国人不遵守防疫相关法律和规定的情况，外交部发言人华春莹2日表示，所有在华外国人都应该严格遵守《中华人民共和国传染病防治法》等相关法律和各地疫情防控的相关规定。中方有关举措和规定，对所有中国公民和在华外国公民一视同 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBtB8A9Nq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489319148617468:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489319148617468&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">@ 海外留学生，在外如何做好个人防护？官方指南来了！】①无论在任何场合，都要保持良好的个人卫生习惯；②租住集体公寓的，每日通风2到3次，每次通风20到30分钟；③人员密集或相对密闭的环境中，一定要佩戴口罩……<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%AE%98%E6%96%B9%E9%98%B2%E6%8A%A4%E6%8C%87%E5%8D%97%23&amp;from=default">#海外留学生官方防护指南#</a>+<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%236%E4%B8%AA%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%85%B3%E5%BF%83%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98Q%26A%23&amp;from=default">#6个海外留学生关心问题Q&amp;A#</a>↓↓转给有需要的人！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【北京警方：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9D%A6%E6%A1%91%E5%B0%BC%E4%BA%9A%E7%B1%8D%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E8%BF%9D%E5%8F%8D%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%E8%A2%AB%E5%A4%84%E9%99%90%E6%9C%9F%E5%87%BA%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#坦桑尼亚籍男子违反防疫规定被处限期出境#</a>】4月2日，北京市公安局副局长潘绪宏通报入境进京人员违反防疫规定违法行为查处情况。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%B1%8D%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E8%BF%9D%E5%8F%8D%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%E8%A2%AB%E9%99%90%E6%9C%9F%E5%87%BA%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#北京通报外籍男子违反防疫规定被限期出境#</a>。3月27日、28日，北京朝阳公安分局潘家园派出所接到社区报警和网民反映，一坦桑尼亚籍男子不配合疫情防控措施，警 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBtcoDQq3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489303809496295:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489303809496295&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489295835968662" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBsZxp2IK?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 16:09" date="1585814996000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489295835968662:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 16:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E7%9B%91%E6%B5%8B%E8%8C%83%E5%9B%B4%E5%B0%86%E8%BF%9B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E6%89%A9%E5%A4%A7%23&amp;from=default">#无症状感染者监测范围将进一步扩大#</a>】4月2日，国家卫健委疾控局监察专员王斌表示，目前无症状感染者的报告、流行病学调查与密切接触者管理的要求与确诊病例基本一致。为了进一步加强对无症状感染者监测，要加强针对性筛查力度，将监测范围进一步扩大到已发现病例和无症状感染者的密切接触者 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBsZxp2IK" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489295835968662:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489295835968662&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4489293562644958" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBsVSb64C?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 16:00" date="1585814455000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489293562644958:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%BE%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%AD%E5%BF%83%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E5%8A%9B%23&amp;from=default">#疾控中心回应无症状感染者传播力#</a>】中国疾控中心流行病学首席专家吴尊友表示，宁波疾控中心最近的研究提示，平均每个确诊病人能够传播3个病人，平均每个无症状感染者能够传播不到1个病人，无症状感染者传染力相当于确诊病例的三分之一。由无症状感染者传播的病例占总发病人数的不到5%，以上是来自宁 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBsO8Eghy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489288769595712:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489288769595712&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <p class="icon"><span class="W_icon icon_rederrorS"></span></p><p class="txt">由于用户设置，你无法回复评论。</p>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4489289176000370&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=1824792152&amp;commentmid=4489288769595712" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>455</em></span></a>                    </span></li>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-2 15:43</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E9%80%9A%E6%8A%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%B1%8D%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%8F%92%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#青岛通报外籍人员插队#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B4%82%E5%B1%B1%E6%8F%92%E9%98%9F%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E8%87%B4%E6%AD%89%23&amp;from=default">#崂山插队外国人致歉#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B4%82%E5%B1%B1%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=崂山发布">@崂山发布</a> 通报：4月1日上午，3名外籍人员在崂山区疾控中心进行核酸检测采样时，因排队与其他人员发生争执，外籍人员出现不当的言语和行为，引发广泛关注。崂山区公安机关于4月2日上午会同相关部门，对涉事外籍当事人依法依规进行批评教育，警示其要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBsxo0Fpm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489278380159176:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489278380159176&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489270666279810" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBskWqlFg?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 14:29" date="1585808996000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489270666279810:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 14:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B32000%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#现有确诊病例降至2000以下#</a>！祝早日康复！】截至4月1日24时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B1863%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市现有确诊病例1863例#</a>，含重症病例429例，现有疑似病例153例。累计确诊病例81589例，累计治愈出院病例76408例，累计死亡病例3318例，累计追踪到密切接触者709570人，尚在医学观察的密切接触者20072人。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E55%E4%BE%8B%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#新增55例无症状感染者#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%9A%E5%9C%A8%E5%8C%BB%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%851075%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#尚在医学观察无症状感染者1075例#</a>】4月1日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者55例，其中境外输入无症状感染者17例；当日转为确诊病例9例（境外输入转为确诊9例）；当日解除医学观察338例（境外输入解除医学观察12例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515450&amp;ssig=Tf4dgrV2%2Fi" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489266488416857" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBseczjBL?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 14:13" date="1585808000000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489266488416857:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 14:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【这就是中国速度】一声号令，白衣战士除夕出征；十天十夜，火神山医院神速落成；平均一天一个，方舱医院改造分秒必争；所有援鄂医疗队，从接到指令到组建完成，平均不超2小时，从集结到抵汉，平均不超24小时。团结一心，众志成城，这就是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%23&amp;from=default">#疫情下的中国速度#</a>↓↓ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

        </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489259098168267"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>4637</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515450&amp;ssig=Tf4dgrV2%2Fi" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489252144689215" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBrR4jFSv?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 13:16" date="1585804580000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489252144689215:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 13:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民微评：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A7%84%E5%88%99%E8%87%B3%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%B9%E6%8F%92%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#规则至上不容插队#</a>！】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B4%82%E5%B1%B1%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%8F%92%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#崂山核酸检测外国人插队#</a>。无视劝阻，强行插队，谁给的底气？出言不逊，叫嚷“中国人出去”，谁给的特权？谁都不能凌驾于规则之上，更不能破坏了规则还振振有词。外防输入、内防反弹仍是重任，无论中国人还是外国人都须配合。依法依规处理，别让个别人影响防控大局 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBrR4jFSv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489252144689215:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489252144689215&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E6%A3%AE%E6%9E%97%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E6%98%8E%E7%81%AB%E5%B7%B2%E7%BB%8F%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%89%91%E7%81%AD%23&amp;from=default">#西昌森林火灾明火已经全部扑灭#</a>】截至4月2日12时01分，四川西昌市经久乡森林火灾取得重大战果，明火已全部扑灭，转入清烟点、守余火、严防死灰复燃阶段。（宋豪新 王波 王凡） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489244557002310:1034-video:1034%3A4489244421586960:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489244557002310:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZOqKoH" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZOqKoH" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A290%E5%90%8E%E8%A1%97%E8%88%9E%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%23&amp;from=default">#雷神山医院90后街舞小哥#</a>：你兄弟也是在雷神山有故事的人了！】90后雷神山建设者匡文博，因为曾为医护人员跳舞，被网友称作<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9B%B7%E7%A5%9E%E5%B1%B1%E8%A1%97%E8%88%9E%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%23&amp;from=default">#雷神山街舞小哥#</a>。雷神山工程交付后，他又留下负责医护区的维保工作，两个多月没回家。他说，人生一辈子，让自己特骄傲的事不多。你兄弟也是在雷神山有故事的人了！（ 张意 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBrymull6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489240547231872:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489240547231872&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4489240547231872&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515450&amp;ssig=Tf4dgrV2%2Fi" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489233379052969" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBrmNBZ5D?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 12:01" date="1585800106000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489233379052969:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 12:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【勇士们辛苦了！这是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%91%E7%81%AB%E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E8%A2%AB%E7%83%9F%E7%86%8F%E8%BF%87%E7%9A%84%E8%84%B8%23&amp;from=default">#救火武警被烟熏过的脸#</a>】连夜救火，武警小哥脸上留下了救火熏过的痕迹，他们是武警凉山支队的队员。西昌经久乡森林火灾中，武警凉山支队共出动400人参加扑救行动，撤回后，他们就这样靠着墙，并排着入睡…网友：辛苦了，个个都是真男神！（四川观察） ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489229726365006"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1745</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489228597256982" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBrf5urS6?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 11:42" date="1585798966000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489228597256982:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 11:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A0%E5%B7%9E%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E8%BF%9B%E8%A1%8C%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E6%8E%88%E8%AF%BE%23&amp;from=default">#美国加州所有学校进行网上授课#</a>，所有学校整个学年不再开门】当地时间4月1日，美国加州州长纽森在疫情媒体发布会上表示，鉴于加州疫情的迅速扩散，加州所有学校今年整个学年都不会再开门，此决定将持续到今年9月份待新学年的开始，在此期间所有学校将继续进行网上授课。此决定将影响加州600万名学生 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBrf5urS6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489228597256982:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489228597256982&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489228597256982"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>593</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4489228744241195&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=5185817263&amp;commentmid=4489228597256982" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>53</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-2 11:43</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【治愈！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A4%E5%8F%AA%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%9D%E4%B8%8A%E6%BC%94%E6%9E%9D%E5%A4%B4%E9%9B%AA%E6%9D%A5%E7%96%AF%23&amp;from=default">#两只国宝上演枝头雪来疯#</a>】3月29日，秦岭部分区域迎来降雪，在位于陕西汉中的秦岭大熊猫野化培训佛坪基地，两只大熊猫“小馨”和“路路”见到雪十分兴奋，它们爬上树枝，摇晃树上的积雪，玩得不亦乐乎。网友：可爱，就是有点费树<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/7b/2018new_miaomiao_org.png" title="[喵喵]" alt="[喵喵]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489222649775474:1034-video:1034%3A4489184879247362:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489222649775474:2803301701" title="新华视点的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z0c6c6" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z0c6c6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新华视点的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                                                                                    <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/u/5579260163" usercard="id=5579260163">-小艺爱吃肉</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member3"></em></a>                             等人

                </div>
                        <div class="between_line S_bg1" node-type="comment_line"></div>

            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489216198706193" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqV5AwSt?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:53" date="1585796010000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489216198706193:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:53</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%9B%AE%E5%89%8D142%E4%B8%87%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%B0%9A%E5%9C%A8%E5%9B%BD%E5%A4%96%23&amp;from=default">#目前142万留学生尚在国外#</a>】外交部副部长马朝旭透露，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%A4%96%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%80%BB%E6%95%B0160%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#我国海外留学生总数160万#</a>，目前142万人尚在国外，分布在不同国家和地区。大多数留学人员按照权威建议，仍然选择留在当地，可以避免旅行交叉感染和中转国家管控措施中途受阻。对确实有困难需要回国的人员，将协助他们逐步有序回国，留 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBqV5AwSt" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489216198706193:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489216198706193&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9300%E5%90%A831%E4%B8%87%E4%BB%BD%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%91%E7%BB%99%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#首批300吨31万份健康包将发给留学生#</a>】民航局副局长吕尔学介绍，首批健康包31万份约300吨，将运往意大利、韩国、法国、德国、美国、英国、荷兰、瑞典、日本、澳大利亚、加拿大、马来西亚等12个国家46个使领馆，之后再分发给留学生。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E5%B0%86%E4%BA%8E4%E6%9C%8810%E6%97%A5%E8%BF%90%E8%BE%93%E5%AE%8C%E6%AF%95%23&amp;from=default">#首批健康包将于4月10日运输完毕#</a>。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489214181311711:1042163-video:1042163%3A4489213987717156:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489214181311711:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z0RZsU" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z0RZsU" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489211740743127" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqNU37jV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:35" date="1585794947000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489211740743127:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【民航局：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E6%AF%8F%E5%91%A8%E4%B8%8D%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87134%E7%8F%AD%23&amp;from=default">#国际航班每周不超过134班#</a>】民航局副局长吕尔学介绍，目前国际航班总量维持在每周不超过134班，这个航班计划会动态调整，例如本周只有108班。大幅调减国际航班是为了有效阻断境外输入疫情，保底最低水平的航空量是保障海外公民留学生的必要需求。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489211740743127:1042163-video:1042163%3A4489211634450435:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489211740743127:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z0HCIu" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z0HCIu" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489210792551514" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqMnaHLs?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:32" date="1585794721000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489210792551514:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8E%A5%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E9%A3%9E%E6%9C%BA%E5%B7%B2%E5%9C%A89%E7%82%B9%E5%8D%8A%E8%B5%B7%E9%A3%9E%23&amp;from=default">#接英国留学生飞机已在9点半起飞#</a>】4月2日10时，国务院新闻办公室举行新闻发布会，外交部副部长马朝旭介绍，国内正在考虑对疫情严重国家确实有困难、急需回国的留学人员，采取逐步有序的方式，做出相应的安排。今天，我们已经安排临时包机飞往伦敦，接回一批处境困难的留学人员。这架飞机已 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBqMnaHLs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489210792551514:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489210792551514&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBqJWaV2s&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515457&amp;ssig=%2FfTf4VR%2FSl" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489209282602540" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqJWaV2s?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:26" date="1585794361000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489209282602540:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：3月安排<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%239%E6%9E%B6%E6%AC%A1%E5%8C%85%E6%9C%BA%E6%8E%A5%E5%9B%9E%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%85%AC%E6%B0%911457%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#9架次包机接回中国公民1457人#</a>】在国新办2日举行的疫情期间中国海外留学人员安全问题新闻发布会上，外交部副部长马朝旭透露，3月份全球疫情加速扩散后，中国已经安排包机9架次，从伊朗、意大利等国接回包括留学人员在内的中国公民1457人。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489209282602540:1042163-video:1042163%3A4489209516589060:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489209282602540:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z0Y0ZP" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z0Y0ZP" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                                <a name="4489207898338973" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqHHyZlz?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:20" date="1585794031000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489207898338973:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%96%E4%BA%A4%E9%83%A8%E5%B0%86%E5%90%91%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BE%E5%8F%911100%E5%A4%9A%E4%B8%87%E4%BB%BD%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#外交部将向留学生派发1100多万份口罩#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%BF%E9%A2%86%E9%A6%86%E8%B0%83%E9%85%8D50%E4%B8%87%E4%B8%AA%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E7%BB%99%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%23&amp;from=default">#使领馆调配50万个健康包给留学生#</a>】外交部副部长马朝旭介绍，各使馆领馆通过各种渠道为留学人员发放“健康包”，源源不断向中国留学生调配50万份健康包，包括1100多万份口罩、50万份消毒物品等物资。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489207898338973:1042163-video:1042163%3A4489207683416075:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489207898338973:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z0lFFF" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z0lFFF" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489203058744652" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqzTAGSM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 10:01" date="1585792877000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489203058744652:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 10:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489199518341673" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqubz037?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 09:47" date="1585792033000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489199518341673:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 09:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%A5%E8%89%B2%E5%88%97%E5%8D%AB%E7%94%9F%E9%83%A8%E9%95%BF%E5%8F%8A%E5%A6%BB%E5%AD%90%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#以色列卫生部长及妻子确诊新冠肺炎#</a>】据《以色列时报》报道，以色列卫生部长办公室4月1日晚证实，其部长雅科夫∙利兹曼和他的妻子新冠病毒检测均为阳性。目前2人状况良好，正在进行隔离观察并接受适当的治疗。报道称，利兹曼现年71岁，是以色列目前已知确诊新冠肺炎的最高官员，他将居家继续开展工 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBqubz037" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489199518341673:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489199518341673&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-2 09:48</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489193432946072" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBqkncmpi?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 09:23" date="1585790582000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489193432946072:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 09:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E7%88%B1%E6%83%85%E6%95%85%E4%BA%8B%E6%9C%89%E7%BB%AD%E9%9B%86%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#战疫中的爱情故事有续集了#</a>】隔着玻璃门接吻的情侣领证了；“丈夫承诺承包一年家务”的赵英明凯旋了；病房走廊上通过声音眼神认出彼此的夫妻，50天后再次相拥…那些曾让我们动容的爱情故事有了续集↓↓转发，祝福他们，也祝福天下有情人！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%88%B1%E6%83%85%E7%9A%84%E6%A8%A1%E6%A0%B7%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中爱情的模样#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天，你愿为“星星的孩子”转发吗？】他们可能无法注视你的双眼，但渴望你的关注；可能无法适当表达自己，但同样需要交流。自闭症又称孤独症，患者终身存在交往、情绪、行为和智力等多重障碍。和疾病一样伤害他们的，是误解、排斥和歧视。第13个<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E8%87%AA%E9%97%AD%E7%97%87%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#世界自闭症日#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B3%E7%88%B1%E6%98%9F%E6%98%9F%E7%9A%84%E5%AD%A9%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#关爱星星的孩子#</a>，让他们不再孤单！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

                                <a name="4489184054246026" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBq5fhOAi?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 08:45" date="1585788346000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489184054246026:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 08:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E4%B8%80%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A56%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%A7%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#云南新增一英国输入6月大病例#</a>】4月1日0时至24时，云南省新增境外输入确诊病例1例。该病例6个月大，为英籍华人。3月16日随家人从伦敦乘坐CA938航班于17日到达北京，18日从北京乘坐CA4172航班到达昆明，即送到昆明市集中医学观察点集中医学观察，期间未出现发热。因其母核酸检测阳性，患儿即被送至指 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBq5fhOAi" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489184054246026:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489184054246026&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

class=\"item_ico W_fl\"><em class=\"W_ficon ficon_pinfo S_ficon\">Ü<\/em><\/span>\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"item_text W_fl\">\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t简介：    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t人民日报法人微博。参与、沟通、记录时代。    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<\/span>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/li>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"item S_line2 clearfix\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t        \t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"item_ico W_fl\"><em class=\"W_ficon ficon_cd_coupon S_ficon\">T<\/em><\/span>\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"item_text W_fl\">\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t友情链接\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                   【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E6%89%B9%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E6%82%A3%E8%80%8537%E5%A4%A9%E5%90%8E%E5%9B%9E%E8%AE%BF%23&from=default\">#首批方舱出院患者37天后回访#<\/a>，60岁的徐女士讲述她的心路历程：一开始确诊后不让住院，很不理解，后来才知道，重症病人太多了。康复后，她主动联系医院献血浆，但因超过60岁未能成行，“以后还有什么做义工干嘛，如果需要我还是愿意去”。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a                                                                                                              【最新数据：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8586%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#中国以外累计确诊超86万例#<\/a>】截至北京时间4月2日17时，除中国外，203个国家和地区累计确诊862272例，钻石公主号邮轮712例，累计死亡44200例。<a href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%B4%E9%84%82%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%E8%83%8C%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&from=default\">#援鄂团队背后的英雄#<\/a>】武汉的春天终于按下播放键，浙江援鄂团队凯旋。为了能让医疗队员全力投入到抗疫工作中，背后有一群后勤保障队员、志愿者也在默默支持。如今他们也结束了47个在疫情前线的日日夜夜，顺利凯旋。辛苦了，致敬幕后英雄！<a                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【北京警方：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%E7%9B%91%E6%B5%8B%E8%8C%83%E5%9B%B4%E5%B0%86%E8%BF%9B%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E6%89%A9%E5%A4%A7%23&from=default\">#无症状感染者监测范围将进一步扩大#<\/a>】4月2日，国家卫健委疾控局监察专员王斌表示，目前无症状感染者的报告、流行病学调查与密切接触者管理的要求与确诊病例基本一致。为了进一步加强对无症状感染者监测，要加强针对性筛查力度，将监测范围进一步扩大到已发现病例和无症状感染者的密切接触者 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/IBsZxp2IK\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4489295835968662:2803301701\"                                     </div>

                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
